actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry

official_title: To eliminate the fees associated with Forest Service special use permits authorizing a church to use structures and improvements on National Forest System lands for religious or educational purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Agriculture from imposing a special use permit fee on churches using structures or improvements on National Forest System lands for religious or educational purposes.

titles.title: To eliminate the fees associated with Forest Service special use permits authorizing a church to use structures and improvements on National Forest System lands for religious or educational purposes.
